entry.summary: RT Megabyte ᵍᵐ (🧱,🚀) Reddit partnered with Polygon to bring NFTs to 7+ million people 🤯 How? They didn’t require users to know anything about crypto. I just released a guide on how you can recreate the @Reddit Marketplace on @0xPolygon. 👇 It allows email signup and gasless transfer of NFTs 🤩
